content:
Hi <@1282018679558635602> I can help you here

You did the Discord/Reach training last week so you could share content on your FB page, and you are lost both here and on Reach. Not sure where to begin.
For Reach you will open the app and tap Library (middle in the top section) then choose the content piece you want to share. Then tap the Share button in the center-bottom. and choose FB

Thank you, Carolyn. Okay, I'll try again. The Reach/Library screen looks different than I saw last week and is difficult to navigate even on my larger screen. But I'll try again. Any word on whether or not I was accepted for the texting team? Seems I haven't heard anything--should have been a DM here in Discord, yes?

are you using a computer?

You will get a DM from text team, it takes a few days. Do you know how to find the DM on Discord
Yes, on my laptop. And yes, under the top left Pacman-looking icon, yes? Seems it's been a few days, but maybe the training was Thurs PM so less than 3 business days...
here is the Reach screen
tap on library
then select a picture
then tap Share
and pick FB

Right. Maybe I should view on my smaller laptop screen. On my large screen, I get many images and many videos, and oops, maybe my sound was muted when I tried to preview the video sound. I'm more computer savvy than I'm sounding... I'll get there, though.
Okay, I'm good. Thanks, Carolyn. I'll keep checking DM channel re texting. Thought I was supposed to get an email though.
Text sends DMs after you complete training, it can take up to a week. I'm sure you will get it soon.
Got it. Thank you again, Carolyn. So if I have any more questions going forward, go to the general-support channel then how to get into texting or just message there with <@&1266883962727432304>?
if you have more questions, you can come right back here and ask.
Okeydoke.  Going off Discord for now, looking for content on Reach that I want to share. Thanks again.
Thank you for all your work, you are making a difference.
üôè Hope so.
How can you sign up for texting?

Here is the link to sign up for text training - the slot fill quickly so be sure to sign up! https://events.democrats.org/event/672393/?force_banner=true&share_context=event_details&share_medium=copy_link
